definition: to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things

sentences.english: Payment will be made by irrevocable Letter of Credit against presentation of documents to the issuing bank.
sentences.chinese: 付款方式为凭单据以不可撤消的信用证向发卡行议付。

sentences.english: Documents must be presented for negotiation within 10 days after shipment date.
sentences.chinese: 单据须正在拆船后10天内提示议付。

sentences.english: This credit is available with The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation, Shanghai by negotiation against beneficiary’s drafts drawn under this L/C at sight basis.
sentences.chinese: 本信用证在上海汇丰银行议付，随附受益人即期汇票。

sentences.english: Drafts must be presented to the negotiating (or drawee)bank not later than Oct.10 ,2004.
sentences.chinese: 汇票不得迟于2004年10月10日议付。

sentences.english: This credit is available with The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Ltd., Shanghai  by negotiation against beneficiary’s drafts drawn under this L/C at sight basis.
sentences.chinese: 本信用证在上海汇丰银行议付，随附受益人即期汇票。

sentences.english: Negotiation must be on or before the 15rh day of shipment.
sentences.chinese: 自装船日起15天或之前议付。

sentences.english: We surrendered a clean on board bill of lading for negotiation of payment.
sentences.chinese: 议付时我们呈递了清洁装运提单。

sentences.english: The amount of each draft must be endorsed on the reversed of this credit by negotiation bank.
sentences.chinese: 议付行须在信用证背面注明每份汇票的金额。

sentences.english: Charges must be claimed either as they arise or in no circumstances later than the date of negotiation.
sentences.chinese: 一切费用须于发生时或不迟于议付期索偿。

sentences.english: Documents to be presented to negotiation bank within 15 days after shipment effected.
sentences.chinese: 单据须正在拆船后15天内交给银止议付。

sentences.english: The negotiating bank has his responsibility to examine the presented L/C.
sentences.chinese: 议付行须负责审核所提交的信用证。

sentences.english: This credit expires till January 1(inclusive) for negotiation in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 本证在北京议付，有效期至1月1日。

sentences.english: Negotiation under this Credit is restricted to Advising Bank.
sentences.chinese: 依本声誉证签发的汇票限某地称呼银行议付。

sentences.english: Documents to be presented to negotiation bank within 15 days after shipment effected。
sentences.chinese: 单据须在装船后15天内交给银行议付。

pinyin: bu4 ke3 che4 xiao1 xin4 yong4 zheng4

definition: to defer payment/to pay back over long term
to accept (i.e. acknowledge as calling for payment) (commerce)/to honor (a check, a promise)
to present (a bill of exchange etc) for payment
(international trade) documentation (e.g. a bill of lading)
